attributes.action: Award Gina Miller an OBE for services to Parliamentary Sovereignty and Democracy
attributes.background: Gina Miller has brought two successful legal actions to ensure the legality of procedures used by the government to bring about Brexit. She has suffered threats to her and her family’s safety despite which she remains a constant campaigner for Parliamentary Sovereignty and democracy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given an honour.

You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
